levels.start_text: In the beginning, there was nothing…
levels.end_text: Not very interesting, right?

levels.start_text: Let’s add a number!
levels.end_text: What about MORE numbers?

levels.start_text: With just zero and one at our hands, we are able to create all kinds of numbers. Welcome to the Big Bang of Mathematics!
levels.end_text: What if we could somehow combine these numbers together?

levels.start_text: We can! In fact, the act of playing move after move has already implicitly acted as addition, our first operator! Try to do this level in only one move!
With just zero and one at our hands, we are able to create all kinds of numbers. Welcome to the Big Bang of Mathematics!
levels.end_text: What if we could somehow combine these numbers together?
